0: Internal error -- Can denote that your account has been temporarily blocked due to having too frequent station.getPlaylist calls.
9: PARAMETER_MISSING: Usually occurs when one or more required parameters are missing for the method called.
12: LICENSING_RESTRICTIONS: Pandora not available in this country.
13: INSUFFICIENT_CONNECTIVITY: Bad sync time? Clock set wrong?
1001: INVALID_AUTH_TOKEN: Occurs once a user auth token expires.
1003: LISTENER_NOT_AUTHORIZED: station.getPlaylist Error -- Premium Subscription, Trial Expired or Temporary Account Block
1004: USER_NOT_AUTHORIZED: User not authorized to perform action. -- Is your station token correct?
1008: CALL_NOT_ALLOWED.: station.addFeedback Error -- Returned when attempting to add feedback to shared station.
1039: PLAYLIST_EXCEEDED: Too many requests for a new playlist.
